Reviews.Title: Perfect for kids
Reviews.Author: Jane
Reviews.Content: It is a perfect phone for kids. I gave it to my 10 years old a year ago and he still has it.

Reviews.Title: I like it!
Reviews.Author: KELVIN MORILLO
Reviews.Content: I like this item because it meets my expectations! I love it!This is a good cell phone, for that i like a lot!

Reviews.Title: Blu Tatoo
Reviews.Author: Francisco Echegaray
Reviews.Content: It worked well for aproximately one mnth. Then when a call was received  it did not rings. I lost many calls for this reason. I tried to make it ring but was impossible.

Reviews.Title: Lasted just past the cutoff for being able to return it
Reviews.Author: Jeff Johnson
Reviews.Content: The phone worked okay for the first 30 days or so and then it just died.  When I went online to file a return request, I was notified that this deadline had past.  So, now I'm stuck with a useless piece of junk.  Stay away!
